entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 8.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
